learning_objectives.description: Solve graphically or algebraically inequalities of the type k|ax + b| > c (c ≥ 0), k|ax + b| < c (c > 0), k|ax + b| < |cx + d| where k > 0, |ax + b| < cx + d, |ax² + bx + c| > d, |ax² + bx + c| < d. (For graphical solutions, an accurate graph is expected. For algebraic methods, any valid method is acceptable.)
